unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Bumrah's back? Heard it's been troubling him since that Mohali match. Hope he recovers soon. Remember that “Chak De! India” scene where the player gets injured? Don't want that happening before the World Cup! Also, what about Hardik's shoulder after all that running between the wickets in the last T20? Any updates from the NCA on his rehab? Get well soon, lads! India needs you.
